HediffDef.label: Gerzee Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Larger and hardier than most mixes Zeta-Gerzee hybrids are often utilized in heavy labour and asset handling. \nComfortable temperature range: -13c, +13c

HediffDef.label: Forsaken Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Agile, fast, and extremely long lived Forsaken gene stock have produced promising Hybrids although production numbers are limited due to a shortage of material and their bodies are fragile even when compared to standard Reticulan physiology. \nComfortable temperature range: -10c, +23c

HediffDef.label: Thrumkin Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Dense muscle steels against damage and helps this Hybrid lift heavier loads than most Zeta. It's silky soft coat may help ingratiate it with other bio-forms. \nComfortable temperature range: +1c, +18c

HediffDef.label: Human Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Congesting enormous swaths of space, humans are a highly versatile r-selected lifeform. Their populations show vast divergence in gene expression, guided self-modifcation; and fractured, isolated, social systems ripe for bio-collectiion. \nComfortable temperature range: +6c, +18c

HediffDef.label: Scalemen Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Plucked from pre-hybridized human stock these "Scalemen" gene mixes are comfortable at a much higher temperature niche than standard Zeta. \nComfortable temperature range: +13c, +28c

HediffDef.label: Cactoid Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Designed from pre-hybridized human stock Cactoid hybrids can operate in a broad enviromental range and have a natural talent for plant manufacturing, leading them to be in high demand among forward operating co-ops. \nComfortable temperature range: -2c, +25c

HediffDef.label: Moyo Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Moyo are a self-designed subclade of humans morphologically adapted to amphibious living and largely residing in submerged arcologies. Moyo hybrids retain the unique blood biotics of their precursors, which can be harvested and synthesized into various chemicals. \nComfortable temperature range: -1c, +14c \n(Mod "Moyo-From the depth" needed to unlock harvestable blood)

HediffDef.label: Mantis Hybrid
HediffDef.description: An aggressive race of insectoids who've evolved a pair of scythe like appendages and above average ground speed to help close ranged distances. Mantis hybrids have shown themselves useful in procurement raids and compound control roles. \nComfortable temperature range: -10c, +21c \n(Mods "Mantis race" or "Lighter Than Fast" needed to unlock harvestable claws)

HediffDef.label: Astoriel Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Like most Elfomorphic races Astorial are long lived and widely considered attractive by humanoid standards; more unusual is their complete immunity to age related aliments such as carcinoma and alzheimers \nComfortable temperature range: +2c, +19c

HediffDef.label: Drow Hybrid
HediffDef.description: Elfomorphs with a predisposition for senseless cruelty and physical beauty. The Drowian's genesis world is gloomed in dimness and it's enviroment harsh; in turn Drow are able to easily navigate in the dark and have a minor tolerence to toxic environment. \nComfortable temperature range: +3c, +15c

HediffDef.label: Night Elf Hybrid
HediffDef.description: These Elfomorphs are one of many types of co-evolutional intelligences found on P944-1003568, a planet which stands unique for it's abundence of naturally occurring, non-engineered, bio-assets. \nComfortable temperature range: +6c, +18c

HediffDef.label: Blood Elf Hybrid
HediffDef.description: (Not in game) Blood Elves are one of many types of co-evolutional intelligences found on planet ZGT-1003568, which stands unique for it's abundence of natural, non engineered, bio-assets.
